oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photomontage of Central High School, Vanderbilt University, and Hume-Fogg High School football players, Immanuel Baptist Church nursery school class, a polar bear at the New York Zoo, two celebrity explorers, The Cohn School Library, and the Nashville Women's Club Home at 217 Louise Avenue. 16 x 21.5 in. Forms part of the Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
